name: Mimikyu
flavorText: A lonely Pokémon, it conceals its terrifying appearance beneath an old rag so it can get closer to people and other Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mimic
attacks.text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw a card for each card in your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Play Rough
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.
